entities.name: bludger
entities.description: A Bludger is a ball used in Quidditch.

entities.name: quaffle
entities.description: A Quaffle is another flying ball used in the game of Quidditch.

entities.name: adrian pucey
entities.description: Adrian Pucey is a Slytherin student who was mentioned as speeding off towards the goalposts. He was blocked by a Bludger sent his way by Fred or George Weasley.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley is one of the twins who sent a Bludger to block Adrian Pucey's path towards the goalposts.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley is the other twin who sent a Bludger to block Adrian Pucey's path towards the goalposts.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and was mentioned as watching the Quidditch match from his hut using binoculars.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is one of Harry's friends who was watching the Quidditch match with Hermione and Hagrid.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is another one of Harry's friends who was watching the Quidditch match with Ron and Hagrid.

entities.name: angelina johnson
entities.description: Angelina Johnson is a Gryffindor student who was mentioned as flying towards the goalposts with the Quaffle.

relationships.description: A Bludger hit Adrian Pucey in the back of the head.
Fred Weasley sent a Bludger to block Adrian Pucey's path towards the goalposts.
George Weasley also sent a Bludger to block Adrian Pucey's path towards the goalposts.
Hagrid used binoculars to watch the Quidditch match from his hut.
Ron and Hermione squeezed together to give Hagrid enough space to join them.
Angelina Johnson had possession of the Quaffle and was able to fly towards the goalposts.
